error: An unexpected error occurred: User 'facebook' not found or query returned no data.

facebook/zstd.summary: Recent activities in the facebook/zstd repository involve improvements to the ZSTD_readSkippableFrame function, including a pull request that addresses an issue where the function asserts when the frame size exceeds the destination capacity, even when the destination is NULL. This update enhances the functionality and business logic of the library.
